title: AuthTokenGet
name: AuthTokenGet
description: Refresh tokens are long lived but auth tokens are short lived. Using a valid refresh token, this api delivers an auth token to access data endpoints.

Success 200.description: Authentication token short lived to access data.

Errors.description: Authorization header not well formated.
Refresh token has expired and client should get a new one.
Refresh token has has been revoked and client should get a new one.
Token is invalid (decode, rights, signature...).

title: RefreshTokenGetWithKey
name: RefreshTokenGetWithKey
description: Get a refresh token using a API Key.

Errors.description: Missing API_KEY header.
Invalid API_KEY header.

Success 200.description: Refresh token long lived to request access data.

title: RefreshTokenGetSteam
name: RefreshTokenGetWithSteam
description: First endpoint to call in the auth process with user. Calling it redirects to the steam login page. After login, the user is redirected to a callback url with the refresh token as a parameter. The URL is defined in the backend config. Frontend must be able to manage the token incoming as a parameter.
